title: List of Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me! episodes (2004)
text: The following is a list of episodes of <a href="Wait%20Wait...%20Don%27t%20Tell%20Me%21">Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!</a>, <a href="NPR">NPR</a>'s <a href="news">news</a> <a href="panel%20game">panel game</a>, that aired during <a href="2004%20in%20radio">2004</a>. All episodes, unless otherwise indicated, feature host <a href="Peter%20Sagal">Peter Sagal</a> and announcer/scorekeeper <a href="Carl%20Kasell">Carl Kasell</a>, and originated from the studios of <a href="WBEZ">WBEZ</a>/<a href="Chicago">Chicago</a>. Dates indicated are the episodes' original Saturday air dates. Job titles and backgrounds of the guests reflect their status at the time of their appearance.
